website_summaries.verdict: A huge variety of bits for wood and more, but quality varies.
pros: Features 100 bits for wood, metal, plastic, and masonry in a wide variety of shapes and sizes
Driving bits include Philips, flat, and Torx

customer_reviews.title: Not the old Craftsman I grew up to love
customer_reviews.text: As a professional contractor I can say these are horrible. I bought them to use at the house and have had nothing but a bad experience. Very cheap drivers and bits. I have broke 4 bits and it wasn't even a challenge. The tips simply break off! I've used DeWalt and numerous other brands that are way better than these. I wish Craftsman was like my dad's old Craftsman, but those days are apparently long gone. Save your money and put it towards a better set. These are not good.
customer_reviews.author: Jagged Husker

customer_reviews.title: Worst bit set I ever purchased
customer_reviews.text: Worst bit set I ever purchased, tips cracked off screwdrivers and bit snapped on several first uses. I've never broken a screwdriver tip off before, broke two on first use here. One with a Ryobi chordless drill with an old set of batteries, in other words, not that much turning power for screwing plastic legs with predrilled holes into a pine 2x4.
customer_reviews.author: Ford B.

customer_reviews.title: A box of Legos?
customer_reviews.text: When I first received the box it sounded a lot like a few years ago when I got a new lego toy, not quite what I was expecting. Then upon opening it I was surprised to find all of the bits were scattered all over the place. I'm not sure if the mailman decided to play kickball with it or if the packaging needs some changing, but overall it was somewhat disappointing, and I had to spend roughly 45 minutes organizing it all (still isn't quite how I'd like it). The drill bits seem to be of decent quality though (high speed steel from the looks). And at this price everything seems to be average to above average.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: the outside box came in perfect condition. The merchandise in the box was not ...
customer_reviews.text: the outside box came in perfect condition. The merchandise in the box was not that well. You can tell by the picture the box was Crack, the outside box was ripped, drill bits where all over inside case.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two breaks and one deformed after few uses
customer_reviews.text: Maybe I am unlucky but two drill bits snapped into two halves in use, somehow they are performing worse than some no name brand ones I bought earlier on and Amazon. The 1/2 inch one got deformed in use, I had to go out and buy one in the middle of a job. I am only using these for some DIY stuff, not heavy duty use. .... Won't buy again. But one thing I need to admit, it has a great box, with extra storage on two sides with a transparent cover.
customer_reviews.author: T Wang

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: These feel like normal bits, but they are the worst I have ever used! I have always purchased Craftsman tools, always. That's why I purchased this set. The driving bits are worthless after one use and the drill bits are useless to begin with. I would expect this kind of craftsmanship from some Chinese seller that makes them in the back of their restaurant not from Craftsman!!
customer_reviews.author: cwatson

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy it
customer_reviews.text: I still bought this despite the reviews of pieces breaking on first use . Well guess what happened . Broke 3 bits in first project in use taking apart an ATV. 1 flat head 1 star 1 Phillips . All crap . Craftsmen used to be the best around , not so much anymore . This sucks don’t buy it
customer_reviews.author: jessie

customer_reviews.title: pretty decent set
customer_reviews.text: pretty decent set. I was disappointed to have purchased such a large piece set and it NOT have torque screw bits. How many Flat head and Phillips bits does one need? why have 20 phillips and 20 flat instead of putting some torque bits in there?
customer_reviews.author: C. Cody

customer_reviews.title: Low quality materials
customer_reviews.text: I've used this kit over the course of a few weeks, so far I have broken a drill bit and the bit extension. I don't think I treat my equipment hard. I was just screwing in deck nails and the extension broke at the end that the star bit goes into, not the drill side. Also, was pre-drilling holes and the 7/64" drill bit just broke off when pulling back up through the board. I personally would stay away from this kit. Had I known I may have gone with something more expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Keale Heinz

customer_reviews.title: Obviously very poor quality metal.
customer_reviews.text: I always buy Craftsman and their quality has always held up, but this item was definitely not the case. Upon using the driver bits, they work about as if they were made of zinc. I can run about 3 screws into soft wood before it is totally destroyed. The metal doesn't hold up to any torque before it twists and rounds. I have no problem when I use my bits from another brand. I have even had one actually completely fail and twist the tip off still inside the screw head. Very disappointed in my purchase, totally poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: User12181

customer_reviews.title: Really great - highly recommended.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my dad who runs a construction business. He has a favorite drill but commented that his bits were wearing down so I got it for him and he since carries it everywhere now and it has come in handy not just for his work, but also for household jobs. He noted it had more than what he would have thought and has found the extra items really handy. He loves it! For a guy who's really hard to buy for, this gift was a touchdown!
customer_reviews.author: Alison Ramos

customer_reviews.title: Not made in the USA
customer_reviews.text: In the details for this product, It said that this product was from the USA. It's not, it's made In China. That was a big let down. Anyway, I have other tools that are made in China, so not that big of a deal. The bit holder broke the first time I used it, and the carrying case does not not do a good job of holding the pieces in place.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broken bit the first time used
customer_reviews.text: Update: several driver bits bits have broken and/or rounded over. Metal quality is junk. Also several bits broke the first time. I’ve only used these to drill or drive into 2x4’s. Utter junk. Will no longer buy craftsman products. The assortment is great. quality not so much. One of the bits broke the first time out. I haven't used everything yet so I can't attest for the rest of the kit. But if the broken bit is any indication then I don't have high hopes for this.
customer_reviews.author: motorgod0

customer_reviews.title: great bargain, great quality, buy today!
customer_reviews.text: what a great deal and quality for the price. I did hours of research on what bit sets to buy when I needed new ones and so many were insanely overpriced in my opinion, I mean I get paying for quality but come on. then I found this set and just jumped for it. so glad I did. haven't had any problems with stripping or breaking bits. great case! great quality! great bargain!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Harbor Freight quality at Craftsman price, but fairly decent overall
customer_reviews.text: What happened to craftsman quality? It used to be rare to break or wear out a craftsman tool... now its like they use softer metal to cause it to fail too soon. Decent set, harbor freight quality at craftsman price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price.
customer_reviews.text: If you want a good set for a good price, this is a pretty good one. Not the best in the world. If you're doing light duty, odds and ends , like hanging blinds around the house, re-hanging stair rails and the occasional floor drilling to run some new cable wire, this one is good. Don't expect the #2 phillips heads to last long though, order an extra pack of these to replace as they either strip or break. Especially if you're taking apart an old deck. (Most don't last long anyway). Overall, satisfied with the drill bits, and overall not too bad for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Its what ya need
customer_reviews.text: Is this the highest quality product out on the market? no. Does it have everything you need to turn your cordless drill/driver into a tool that can handle all parts of a project? yes. I built a whole deck with these drills and drivers. Some have stripped down to nothing but it got the job done. Good price.
customer_reviews.author: I. Joseph Marguliath

customer_reviews.title: Worth a really good price and quality
customer_reviews.text: Vaughn as a Christmas present for my brother-in-law and it is really good quality and holds up cuz he's a heavy equipment mechanic and work on a variety of machines and engines
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my Dad for Christmas and he has used much of the many pieces in this set and, so far, none have broke, stripped, bent etc.. This is the perfect set for household use and more especially for the incredible price! I'm absolutely satisfied with this Craftsman drilling set as well as my Pop! It's definitely a "must have" for your home and more & for the price is just all the more reason to get this!
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Glackin

customer_reviews.title: Great assessory for a drill driver.
customer_reviews.text: Great attachments for a drill driver. My niece needed something to take things off the wall, and take things apart for an upcoming move. She told me she has used almost every attachment in the kit, good job.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Somewhat satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I have already broken 2 drill bits 3 Stars... The drivers and screw bits are very sturdy and durable definitely 5 Stars. The carbon bits are not as sturdy. I have a set of titanium bits that are both sturdy and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Ashton Ramlogan

customer_reviews.title: The quick change bit holder was not put together straight enough to be useful. Not sure if that's just mine or a ...
customer_reviews.text: The Phillip bits are so soft that they flexed and then slipped causing their teeth to be ground down by the screw in under 1 second. The screw was barely affected. I went through 3 bits trying to put 6 screws in. I also pre-drilled the hole AND used soap on the screw to lubricate. That's why they give you so many. The quick change bit holder was not put together straight enough to be useful. Not sure if that's just mine or a common defect. The general purpose drill bits and Brad Points worked perfectly however. They're sharp and holding their edge surprisingly enough. That's worth a star.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: you can spend more on higher quality kits from companies like Dewalt, but odds are that this kit is ...
customer_reviews.text: This kit has a little bit of everything in a case that display all the components neatly. Sure, you can spend more on higher quality kits from companies like Dewalt, but odds are that this kit is fine for most folks. This is however the first Craftsman product I've purchased in recent memory that was made in China.
customer_reviews.author: J.C.

customer_reviews.title: All you will ever need
customer_reviews.text: I have so many bits and I keep losing them because I don't have a good way to store them. This set has everything you will ever need. Love the set couldn't be happier with it. Would also make for a great gift as well.
customer_reviews.author: Brett.W.J

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the driver bits ended up using some of the drill bits they're better than I expected to... Especially the masonry bits drill through concrete like it's nothing
customer_reviews.author: bradford

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if they are really Craftman
customer_reviews.text: For the money they are good, dont think they are real craftman think they are using the brand name they are cheap but they dont seem like craftman they are ok
customer_reviews.author: RM

customer_reviews.title: One of the bits broke during the first use
customer_reviews.text: For the amount of bits that you get, it seems to be a great value for the money, but the 3/16 bit broke on the first use
customer_reviews.author: Butch Bobcat

customer_reviews.title: Good durable set. Good price
customer_reviews.text: This was a great set for the money. Unfortunately I didn’t realize that one of the drill bits was broken before it was to late to return for a new set. So just double check your set once it’s arrived. Other than that I have been happy with this set.
customer_reviews.author: The Hudson’s

customer_reviews.title: Great kit for the amount of pieces and price would recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I was in need of some drill bits and this kit met my needs, I have yet to use the drill bits but I did use the phillips bit in my impact drill just to test the quality of them. The bits did start to wear after awhile in which I figured as much since they are not impact rated! But overall I am happy with this set so far! For the price you cannot beat 100 pieces! I will try to remember to update as I use it more. Thank you for reading and I hope that my review helps!
customer_reviews.author: We must take control of America

customer_reviews.title: missing pieces
customer_reviews.text: When I opened the box, the cardboard cover was worn, torn and missing half of it. When I opened the case, pieces were missing.
customer_reviews.author: P. Emory

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY PLS READ THE BAD REVIEWS TO.
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely not a value for your money its durability is laughable i was outside of my return window but gladly took the 7 dollar deduction just so I could get some kind of refund. The bits at the dollar store are better quality. 10 out of 10 absolutely would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: mightymidas

customer_reviews.title: Good Amount of Bits for the PRice
customer_reviews.text: Really good variety and selection of bits in this package. I would recommend this to anyone who has a drill but needs to acquire a good amount of drill bits.
customer_reviews.author: Rusty Shakleford

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Shouldn't be allowed to have the craftsman name! Sears and roebuck would have never sold this junk
customer_reviews.author: Robert L. Ullman Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality tools
customer_reviews.text: Amazing value for the price. I bought this for my home projects and they have been extremely useful. I will buy again for my dad.
customer_reviews.author: rustproof

customer_reviews.title: Cheap material or poor handling transporting.
customer_reviews.text: Came in a really good packaged box but the plastic case that holds the tools was broken at the latch so it won’t stay closed and also a few of the little bit holders were broken and I had bits all scattered that won’t lock in place now because the plastic tabs aren’t there to hold them in place.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Received item broken and was refused return the day after receiving.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product for a gift and got it and the latch on the box and around the latch fell off in my hand when I opened this, broken. I requested to return the next day an got an email stating my request denied due to expiration of returns period! Really! I will be filing a claim on this. All I want is a product not broken.
customer_reviews.author: downadirtroad

customer_reviews.title: Nice  drill/driver kit.
customer_reviews.text: By price comparison this is a fairly complete selection of power drill attachments. Yes, there are one or two I would add but, for the price (compared with other sets) it's a great value. Plastic case is large with room for additions. Enough duplicates in case you lose some. The bits themselves are typical heat-treated hardened steel. Craftsman is still a great brand. Would have liked the next two larger drill bits included.in twist drill, spade bit and nut driver. This was still a real steal at this price on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: kermitkabab

customer_reviews.title: I'm disappointed with the name "Craftsman" these days
customer_reviews.text: Absolute junk, I'm disappointed with the name "Craftsman" these days. A wood bit broke on the 2nd hole into 7/16" plywood and a phillips bit broke after driving about 20 screws into pine. This will be getting returned
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: good value for the money
customer_reviews.text: If you want an impact grade drill bit set... then buy one. Otherwise, your expectations should be equivalent to what you get... actually... you will be 105% pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Snoopy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Price for Quality
customer_reviews.text: Like everything about this little set. Has most tools I need for inside the house - they are durable as well. Extra storage is nice for misc items.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Sherwin

customer_reviews.title: Just right !
customer_reviews.text: Really nice kit. Only problem is you have to put all the bits back in their holders when it arrives! They all jar out! But it is zip tied shut from the factory so you won't lose any pieces in shipment. It's a good selection of bits. Most kits have too much of one thing and not enough of another. This one is just right.
customer_reviews.author: Shaun

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I needed to fill in a set with used up pieces and wound up really liking this set. The bits are lasting nicely and the other parts seem sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Robert From NY

customer_reviews.title: but it seems nice. I like that the case has extra storage ...
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used it yet, but it seems nice. I like that the case has extra storage on the outside. It did arrive with all the bits jumbled up, and some of the clips broken. I know this is nit picky, but it was frustrating having to put them all back.
customer_reviews.author: Kel324

customer_reviews.title: Amazing drill/driving kit!!
customer_reviews.text: For the price, I was blown away with how much was included in this and how great the quality was. Will buy as gifts for friends. Everyone should have one of these.
customer_reviews.author: Rob F

customer_reviews.title: Tools good, case not so much
customer_reviews.text: The tools are solid and the items included are mostly useful ones. The interior of the case is not well constructed. There were several tabs broken that hold the bits when I received it so those items wont stay in place.
customer_reviews.author: D. M. King

customer_reviews.title: Seemed like a great deal
customer_reviews.text: Originally I was going to give this 5 stars, but some things about this set detract from the overall value of the product after a little use. 1) I broke one bit the very first time I used it, drilling milkjug plastic no less. 2) The case is not durable, it cracks easily, I don't anticipate this part lasting long. 3) Though it's Craftsman, the quality of the tools is similar to Harbor Freight, I didn't expect much for the price, but still a disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Look Elsewhere
customer_reviews.text: This set is foreign crap. Driver bits self destruct after a few uses. Every thing is cheap. Don't waste time or money.I remember when Craftsman was a name you could count on. An icon of reasonably priced American made tools. Not anymore.I'll never buy Craftsman again.
customer_reviews.author: P. Edgar

customer_reviews.title: Very accessable. Decent quality. 100 pieces misleading, duplicate bits
customer_reviews.text: The kit was well put together, however the 100 piece is slightly misleading because there are several duplicates of the same bit. It is nice to have spares but 15 of the same ph2 phillip heads? but only 2 ph1 and 2ph3 bits. They should have at least given me a better ratio. The metal used looks and feels like quality steel, but being manufactured in china there is this metallic smell coming from the bits that are coated with a greasy oil film.
customer_reviews.author: Tran

customer_reviews.title: Finally something that works!
customer_reviews.text: I've given 5 stars as I just received the kit. I've only used it to put together a rolling cabinet. The drill bits and screw driver bits both worked perfectly with no sign of stripping on the ends.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Metal so soft bits become worthless after just a few screws
customer_reviews.text: Loved the variety and quantity. But, I wondered why so many of the same bits. Now I know, they strip just trying to screw into existing screw holes. Product is worthless. I first used to rehang doors removed for a tiling project. Can't screw six screws into existing holes for hinges without the tip of the bit just stripping off. And this is into soft wood. Should have been advertised as "disposable bits"!
customer_reviews.author: Mytown

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Perfect value for your money! Great for household use or small projects
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Dyer

customer_reviews.title: What a fine mix!
customer_reviews.text: Like I said....(What a fine mix)! This product array was just perfect for every day drilling, screwing, fastening and even more! I love the great two sided doors for the extra stuff you need that special place for.
customer_reviews.author: BIG MIKE

customer_reviews.title: Awesome set
customer_reviews.text: I love this drill bit set. I had another smaller Craftsman drill bit set and a lot of them were broke or lost. I feel complete now and all the bits have their spot in this awesome case. The case makes it very handy to store in my tool chest and keeps everything together. I am O.C.D. and I like my things together and organized. I am one happy customer and would definitely refer my friends in buying this drill bit set. You won't have to buy another set for a while! I simply love my set.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Camarena

customer_reviews.title: It's a WOW!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set of drivers and bits - almost everything you need for any job! The case has room for storing more pieces on the front and back of it, which is a big plus! Love everything about the set.
customer_reviews.author: GFD

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: When i recieved this some of the bits were loose in the case which is to be expected in shipping, but one of the drill stops was missing the hex nut. Then on first use of one of the PH2 bits the tip stripped on the first screw going into a predrilled hole.
customer_reviews.author: Loid O.

customer_reviews.title: Delivery driver lied and said they handed the package to me.
customer_reviews.text: If i didnt go to my app I woukd have never known that my package was here. It was left om my front door. They never handed anything to me. Delivery driver dont have to lie about delivering products. Besides that product was perfect just what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected.
customer_reviews.text: Not quite what I thought it would be. Smaller than expected but the bits seem to be a good quality. I'll be using them in next couple of days. I'll finish review if need be.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Collins, AKA. Manator

customer_reviews.title: Perfect purchase
customer_reviews.text: Initially I bought this set to have around should the occasion arise. I'm finding that I'm using this more and more for projects. And the case is a must to keep things together.
customer_reviews.author: William Laughlin

customer_reviews.title: Can’t go wrong with Craftsman
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, my husband is a huge Craftsmen fan. He got a new Craftsmen drill and these were exactly what he needed. Can’t go wrong with this brand
customer_reviews.author: Jessi Caldwell

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Everything is so handy and easy to get to. The only thing is remembering to put it back when you are done. Parts are easy to lose
customer_reviews.author: eyez

customer_reviews.title: Cheap -- Broke on first use
customer_reviews.text: I should have known better, you get what you pay for. I broke 2 philips head bits driving the very first screw in.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value and quality for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my husband for Father's Day! Value,was important,thus the Craftsman name. I grew up with my dad who used nothin but Craftsman.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good tools, poorly designed box
customer_reviews.text: Good tool attachment set however the box keeps popping open especially the outside lids. Difficult to jeep them closed where the items you put in won't keep falling out. The tools are super though
customer_reviews.author: Rick 0501

customer_reviews.title: DIY Essential
customer_reviews.text: Great kit that includes most bits for any DIY person. Great quality as is expected from Craftsman. Even comes with a some extra storage space for screws or any other miscellaneous bits you might have.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Hallam

customer_reviews.title: As shown
customer_reviews.text: Overall great and exactly as advertised, but sadly the case came cracked (perhaps damaged in shipping?), so it won't stay closed in it's own. Other than that, no complaints at all!
customer_reviews.author: Quinn Redfield

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Bits are junk I have snapped more of these bits out of this kit than I have in my life no joke waist of money I’d rather buy a 5 pack of good bits than this kit
customer_reviews.author: austen

customer_reviews.title: Great variety, but mediocre quality
customer_reviews.text: I love the variety of drivers and drill bits here, but unfortunately I ran into some issues. The first was that after just a few holes into some soft wood, one of the brad point bits broke. Even more frustrating, though, was that in one project, 4 of the Phillips drivers were completely stripped and useless...Could be user error for sure, but the fact that I went through 4 of the drivers without stripping a single screw head was pretty disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for...
customer_reviews.text: They are not the best, but they get the job done. I like the extra compartments. The box is plastic and not the toughest container, nevertheless it looks good and keeps sh#@t together.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Rafael Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I like having my own drill bits for my newly purchased drill. My husband has a drill with a handful of bits, and that did not suffice for me. Just happy to have a complete set of drill bits in a nice tool box.
customer_reviews.author: Bjdono

customer_reviews.title: Craftsman 100 Piece drilling set
customer_reviews.text: Not Craftsman quality. Cheap plastic case. Not 100 drill bits. 75 screwdriver bits and 25 drill bits. Everything falls out. When it came everything was everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Nelz

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, but not great.
customer_reviews.text: Even though it's the Craftsman name doesn't mean it's the best. There are better tools out there. Was a little bummed out that out of 100 pieces, 38 out them were loose in the case. Good deal for the money.
customer_reviews.author: R. H.Top Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: It is what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I would have liked for the drill bits be for a impact drill, but only the wood bits are for the impact drill. It was hard to tell when looking at the picture of the kit to know that I wouldn't get the bits for a impact.
customer_reviews.author: Clyde P.

customer_reviews.title: Ok set
customer_reviews.text: It's an ok set but the bits aren't hardened enough, I destroyed a Phillips bit in about 10 minutes. Lame.
customer_reviews.author: oldschoolninja

customer_reviews.title: Great selection and value
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t used everything but what I used is very good. Drill bits stay sharp and drives didn’t slip. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lprojr

customer_reviews.title: I've never broken a basic bit like this. The end snapped off in a screw
customer_reviews.text: I would not buy this again. I broke two drill bits the first day using it. Then the second day I broke a Phillips bit. I've never broken a basic bit like this. The end snapped off in a screw. Very cheaply made in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Bartholomew

customer_reviews.title: It has everything you need
customer_reviews.text: Amazing tool kit add on for my drills at a great price comes with everything you need and extremely portable love it
customer_reviews.author: WesBear

customer_reviews.title: Great Set... Neat Case, Very Complete
customer_reviews.text: Great set in a very compact case. The case also has compartments on either side to hold things you use most often...cool idea. I posted a question (so far unanswered) as to whether it has bits for recessed square holes (like hex holes but square), such as those used in furniture and some electronics, and it does. It is an amazingly complete set for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Sojae

customer_reviews.title: Really poor quality material.
customer_reviews.text: The drill bits along with anything else in the kit breaks easily. The material is poor. The sockets get worn out so quick. The price is enticing but not worth the time. Spend a bit more money and get something more durable where you won't have to pull your hair out in a middle of a project.
customer_reviews.author: Business

customer_reviews.title: Cheap plastic case arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: The case is very brittle, and many of the holders arrived broken. Fortunately, there are two external compartments to hold loose bits. If this is the damage done by shipping, I'm sure it will deteriorate further with actual use.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen C

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loved this gift for our 1 year anniversary/valentine's day. I have even used it multiple times! There are a lot of good things and I am happy that everything is organized so that I can go grab the correct bit I need without having to dig through a bag of stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Craftsman bit set
customer_reviews.text: Love this set, has so many different bits and goes well with Craftsman drill, I also used these boots with my other drill.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia K.

customer_reviews.title: Lots function
customer_reviews.text: Very useful kit. Contains many commonly needed drilling bits and accessories. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Priced well for the product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this kit for my husband for our anniversary. It was a hit. It has all the pieces he needed to do the work he wanted to do and more. I've used it and found it to be organized and handy. I would highly recommend this set to anyone looking for a nice, inexpensive drill set. The price was quite reasonable for all that came with it.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy L.

customer_reviews.title: Received in short time nice tool kit
customer_reviews.text: Received in short time nice tool kit. After I fount the locking slide down in the packing and was able to get it back on. All was good again. Recommend it to anyone needing a nice tool kit
customer_reviews.author: The Whiz

customer_reviews.title: Good value!
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Good price. Given as a gift, the receiver of the gift loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Richard B

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent investment! My sons have/had "borrowed" so much of my stuff, I found I was down to nothing. This was a very economical choice to ensure I had something for anything I might possibly need. Since my purchase, I have had to only buy one bit, and it was for a very specific project, so I wasn't particularly disappointed. Great value!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good starter toolset for homeowner
customer_reviews.text: The interior of the molded case lacks fitting the tools in a snug and secure location, allowing the tools and sockets to spill out when opening. Not a good design in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: worst set of junk
customer_reviews.text: I am not a construction working over using my tools. I am a hobbyist and diy things myself occassionally. I have used these drill bits only a hand full of times and at least TEN have snapped in half in the wood. Even in the softest woods. Would not recommend this product period. Craftsman is not what it used to be.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria S.

customer_reviews.title: All in one place.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a central place to carry various drill attachments. This works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Heffron

customer_reviews.title: Great set, great price.
customer_reviews.text: I needed my very own set for my rechargeable drill, and this was perfect. My hubby uses the same set for work, and it has everything I need for around the house and more. It's nice to have everything in this handy, durable case. No more excuses about not having tools to do this or that too. Yeah!
customer_reviews.author: L. DeVoe

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this set
customer_reviews.text: Our bits and pieces head slowly dwindled and been lost here and there. So nice to have an organized kit again. Good variety and great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Synchronicity

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Pretty cheap. The extension piece broke within about 5 minutes of using the product. The metal pieces are probably decent though. I'd spend a bit more on a higher quality brand.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Christensen

customer_reviews.title: Broken piece
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Have been buying craftsman for a very long time. I just didn’t like that it was shipped and delivered with a broken handle.
customer_reviews.author: Evil patrick

customer_reviews.title: Lots Of Vareity, Good Value
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice drill and screw set. Has every size imaginable. I've already used many of the bits.
customer_reviews.author: Suke

customer_reviews.title: TRASH. either knockoff or Craftsman no tmad ein USA is now JUNK
customer_reviews.text: I broke 14 bits putting together a skate ramp. no exaggeration. half of them sheered right in half on the first screw. NOT EVEN USEABLE. Id return this right away but I didn't end up even opening it for 3 months. Don't waste your time with anything not MADE IN USA
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Bozzuto

customer_reviews.title: Wonder why the box is scuffed up fir new oroduct. Hope unused drills etcc
customer_reviews.text: Mine cane looking used(????). Dint know why the box covering came looking so best up fir new product.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy h

customer_reviews.title: Skip it
customer_reviews.text: Garbage unless you're only doing the lightest of work. Three screwdriver bits broken just putting together shelves and taking apart a fence.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Bird

customer_reviews.title: Organized
customer_reviews.text: I like organized tool sets, and I like craftsman brand. This clearly did both
customer_reviews.author: Jax

customer_reviews.title: Look closely at pieces before purchasing
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband and he was disappointed there weren't more usable pieces in it.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Montague

customer_reviews.title: Mostly good enough.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent set for the price. I can’t leave 5 stars because I’ve already broken some of the drill bits. Not amazing quality, but what can you expect for the price?
customer_reviews.author: Jill

product_meta.title: Craftsman 100 Piece drilling and driving kit
product_meta.description: Rather than by every bit you may need for your projects, save some money and buy the 100-piece accessory kit. This kit comes with the standard bits used in most household projects. 22 DRILL BITS, 3 DRILL STOPS, 1 ALLEN KEY, 3 SPADE BITS, 9 NUT DRIVERS, 61 DRIVER BITS, 1 STUBBY SCREW DRIVE, AND FOLDING CASE WITH BUILLT IN STORAGE COMPARTMENTS

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars1,946 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
